sections.MISSION:
Comanche, 1st Squadron, 2d Cavalry Regiment conducts Urban Rifle Marksmanship Qualification and stress shoot on 07 OCT 2024 at RG 211 to maintain proficiency on the M4 and prepare for Team and Squad Live Fire Exercises.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide Soldiers an opportunity to conduct refresher training on their primary weapon system and prepare for Team and Squad Live Fire Exercises.
sections.END STATE:
Soldiers conduct refresher training and successfully complete the URM qualification and stress shoot.
Training Objectives
TC 3-22.9 and TC 3-22.249/ Urban Rifle Marksmanship Firing Stance, Movement techniques, Aiming / Engagement Techniques, Point of Aim, Trigger Manipulation, Fire Commands, Ready Positions, Rules of Arms Safety, Weapon Safety status and Weapon Control Status.

Checkpoint Breakdown
• Soldiers will run from CP 1 (The Tower) to CP 2
• At CP 1 Soldiers will throw sandbags over five feet high engineer tape, then continue to CP 3
• At CP 3 Soldiers will carry two water cans to CP 4
• At CP 4 Soldiers will drag a skedco, weighing 180 lbs 50 meters then proceed to CP 5
• At CP 5 Soldiers will low crawl, high crawl, and 3-5 second rush based on the rates of fire the lane safety calls out, then continue to CP 6.
• At CP 6 Soldiers will follow instructions from lane safety, load a magazine, and engage targets at 100 meters.
